sense.def:
A list
je vrsta stvari, ki so napisane druga pod drugo.

seg.quote: Look at your list of things to be mended.
Find out all their names and make a list.

sense.def:
To list a set of things
pomeni omeniti vrsto stvari drugo za drugo.

seg.quote: There was a label on each case listing its contents.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
listed
, je vključeno kot točka na seznamu.

seg.quote: He is still listed in the files by his code name, the Jackal.
